entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. High minus 19. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Wind north 30 km/h gusting to 50. High minus 19. Wind chill near minus 33. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 04:00 AM CDT Sunday 26 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Snow. Low minus 20.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow beginning early this evening. Blowing snow at times overnight. Amount 2 cm. Wind northeast 40 km/h gusting to 60. Low minus 20. Wind chill near minus 33. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 04:00 AM CDT Sunday 26 March 2023

entry.title: Monday: Snow. High minus 13.
